generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title>direction</title>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas" width="800" height="800"></canvas>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'),
			context = canvas.getContext('2d');
		function createRect(x,y,w,h,direction){
			if(direction){
				context.moveTo(x,y);
				context.lineTo(x+w,y);
				context.lineTo(x+w,y+h);
				context.lineTo(x,y+h);
			}else{
				context.moveTo(x,y);
				context.lineTo(x,y+h);
				context.lineTo(x+w,y+h);
				context.lineTo(x+w,y);
			}
			// context.closePath();
		}

		context.fillStyle = '#DEC02D';
		// context.strokeStyle = '#000000';
		context.shadowColor = 'rgba(200, 200, 0, 0.5)';
		context.shadowOffsetX = 12;
		context.shadowOffsetY = 12;
		context.shadowBlur = 15;

		context.beginPath();
		createRect(50,50,600,600);
		context.moveTo(300,300);
		context.lineTo(350,200);
		context.lineTo(500,300);
		context.closePath();
		context.arc(600,600,50,0,2*Math.PI,false);

		context.fill();


		context.strokeStyle = '#000000';
		context.beginPath();
		createRect(50,50,600,600);
		context.closePath();
		context.stroke();
		context.beginPath();
		context.moveTo(300,300); 
		context.lineTo(350,200);
		context.lineTo(500,300);
		context.closePath(); 
		context.stroke();
		context.beginPath();
		context.arc(600,600,50,0,2*Math.PI,false);  //疑问？为什么arc写在前面就不需要闭合
		context.closePath(); 
		context.stroke();


	</script>
</body>
</html>
